alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Paulding, northwestern Cobb and southeastern Bartow Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Emerson, or near Cartersville, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Marietta, Cartersville, Dallas, Smyrna, Kennesaw, Acworth, Powder Springs, Hiram, Emerson, Fair Oaks, Burnt Hickory Ridge, Lost Mountain Park, Jim R Miller Park, George Washington Carver St Pk, Cross Roads, Due West, and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
